âœ” Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 8.1
âœ” Free hard drive space: 2 GB

DESCRIPTION:

Stalingrad, Kursk, Berlin, Kharkov, to Guadalcanal, Tobruk, Wake Island ... The battles in this game takes place in all the "hot spots" known to us by the Second World. Imagine storming Omaha beach in the spirit of "Saving Private Ryan," in which you could participate or release of Iwo Jima in the best tradition of films of the same name. Players have plenty of opportunities: from the management of the submarine to shooting enemies with a sniper rifle. Battles take place for the control points are placed on each of the cards. During the capture of these points side gets the advantage of technology and the emergence of a new spawn point. Each type of technology - a unique gameplay that will have to re-learn. In the aircraft exactly as the tank has its own strengths and weaknesses, to delve into that you will more than a dozen hours. In total, the game features more than 20 types of equipment for each of the 6 warring parties. 5 sets of infantry. 35 cards (including new ones).

DESCRIPTION:

Welcome to the Vietnam-era one of the bloodiest conflicts of the XX century! In Battlefield Vietnam, the first full-fledged sequel to the popular action movie network, you will find literally a new universe: rich colors of tropical jungle, helicopter gunships, shedding the green fields of fire napalm rivers and fearless guerrillas, causing precise strikes right to the heart of American troops. Changing the theater of war completely changes the strategy and tactics of the game. The developers made hundreds of significant changes in the gameplay; completely redesigned graphics. Before you do a completely new game that is sure to succeed Battlefield 1942 as leader of today's network of entertainment!

DESCRIPTION:

Retaining all the best traditions of the series, Battlefield: Bad Company 2 offers fans the attention of a lot of games interesting new features. Fighting to be in very different circumstances: in the snowy forests and jungle, in the hot deserts and inaccessible mountains, which involves the use of appropriate tactics. Also, players will be able to realize the unique tactics, using in combat new types of equipment, including all-terrain vehicle (ATV) and helicopter UH-60. In addition, the project provided ample opportunities for modification of equipment and various devices that greatly expand the number of available sets of equipment, weapons and combat vehicles. Due to improvements made by developers in a unique graphics engine, Frostbite, the game used in modern visual effects, realistic damage system.

Battlefield 3 leaves behind all its competitors, thanks to the incredible power of the new game engine Frostbite â„¢ 2 from DICE. In this work of art based the entire Battlefield 3, offering the player a great quality graphics, locations of incredible magnitude, the total destruction of objects, dynamic sound and realistic character animation. You will be able to experience the battlefield like never before, with the whistling bullets around, crumbling walls and knocks you off your feet by explosions. In Battlefield 3, players will become an elite US Marine Corps and immerse yourself in the exciting task of single player and superb multiplayer battles across the world, including Paris, Tehran and New York.

DESCRIPTION:

Battlefield 4 â„¢ - a defining genre, full of action fighter, known for its destructible, which has no equal. Based on a powerful and reliable graphics technology Frostbite â„¢ 3, Battlefield 4 offers dive into the gaming environment, is striking in its realism. Only in Battlefield you can destroy buildings, where the enemy is hiding. Only in Battlefield you will lead the assault, while on board combat boats. Battlefield gives you more freedom in actions and deeds, enabling to use their own advantages and pave the way to victory. In addition to the standard multiplayer, Battlefield 4 has a rich dramatic campaign with interesting characters that starts with the evacuation of American VIP-persons from Shanghai, and talks about the future of your team attempts to find a way home. It can not be compared to anything else. Immerse yourself in the wonderful chaos of total war, characteristic only for games in the series Battlefield.

The solution to the passage of the 8th mission:

We found a nontrivial solution of this glitch.
On the steps:

1. go to the farm and look katstsenku.
2. Up to the end of the cutscene (until they have not withdrawn) go to options and unscrew the schedule for ultra high, set the field "zoom" and "image field" to maximum, turn vsync.
3. Start log and wait until we throw into the camera. watch a cutscene where boomer opens the lock. I need to walk out the door.
4. pass autosave and then can be played in the usual manner. simply resetting.
